quest.name: A Porxie Before Swine
journal:
Uin Nee appears even more restless than usual, which should be cause for no small amount of alarm.

â€»Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Defeat the Nu Mou porxienappers in Sextuplet Shallow.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Well, favorite mortal, we could be frolicking with porxies in dreams right now. But nooo! Those awful, nasty lawless ones just had to go and make off with the one I ordered from Pla Enni, so both I and the dreams are...porxieless!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Ugh! Ugh, I say! Oooh, when I get my hands on those porxienappers...

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Wait! I don't need to get my hands on them! Because we have your much larger hands! Good, good. Go and punch a porxienapper in the face for me, mortal!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The porxie is considerably calmed by your ministrations. After sparing you an affectionate snort, it turns toward Lydha Lran.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Safe and sound! And round! And cute! Exactly what I was hoping for! I can spin the loveliest of dreams with a porxie so charming...

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: <sigh> But first I suppose I should inform the Nu Mou in Pla Enni that it arrived safely after all. They were so very anxious about it. Some fae really need to learn to calm down, if you ask me...
